SELECT T.*,u.REAL_NAME realname, (SELECT count(1) from qkjvip_member_activitymbs mb where mb.activity_id=t.id group by mb.activity_id) as activeper, (SELECT count(1) from qkjvip_member_signup sgn where sgn.acitvity_id=t.id group by sgn.acitvity_id ) as signper FROM QKJVIP_MEMBER_ACTIVITY T join sys_user u on (u.USER_ID=t.adduser) WHERE 1=1
AND T.title LIKE '%${params.title}%'
AND T.id = '${params.id}'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signupmember b where b.activity_id=T.id and b.member_id=#{params.memberId})
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signup b where b.acitvity_id=T.id and b.memberid=#{params.memberIdSign})
OR (not EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signup b where b.acitvity_id=T.id and b.memberid=#{params.memberIdSign}) and EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signupaddress adres where adres.activityid=t.id and adres.address like '%${params.memberIdSignAddress}%') )

select * , (SELECT top 1 address from qkjvip_member_signupaddress a where a.activityid=act.id) as addressstr
from (SELECT *, case when ISNULL(( SELECT top 1 sme.id from qkjvip_member_signupmember sme left outer join [dbo].[qkjvip_member] b on sme.member_id=b.member_id where sme.activity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select 1 from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) ),'')='' then 0 else 1 end as istake
from QKJVIP_MEMBER_ACTIVITY t where 1=1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signup s left join [dbo].[qkjvip_member] b on (s.memberid=b.member_id) where s.acitvity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select top 1 * from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) )
union all SELECT *,2 istake from QKJVIP_MEMBER_ACTIVITY t where 1=1
AND (not EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signup s left join [dbo].[qkjvip_member] b on (s.memberid=b.member_id) where s.acitvity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select top 1 * from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) ) )
AND (T.ispri = 0 or EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_activitymbs s left join qkjvip_member b on (s.member_id=b.member_id) where s.activity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select top 1 * from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) ))
and EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signupaddress adres where adres.activityid=t.id and adres.address like '%${params.memberIdSignAddress}%')
) act

SELECT t.*, (SELECT ISNULL(sum(1), 0) from qkjvip_member_activitymbs m where m.activity_id=t.id) as mbsnum, (SELECT ISNULL(sum(1), 0) from qkjvip_member_signup s where s.acitvity_id=t.id ) as signupnum, (SELECT ISNULL(sum(1), 0) from qkjvip_member_signupmember sm where sm.activity_id=t.id ) as smnum from qkjvip_member_activity t where 1=1
AND T.title LIKE '%${params.title}%'
AND T.NAME = '${params.id}'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signupmember b where b.activity_id=T.id and b.member_id=#{params.memberId})

select * from ( SELECT t.*, case when ISNULL(( SELECT top 1 sme.id from qkjvip_member_signupmember sme left outer join [dbo].[qkjvip_member] b on sme.member_id=b.member_id where sme.activity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select 1 from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) ),'')='' then 0 else 1 end as istake, (SELECT top 1 address from qkjvip_member_signupaddress a where a.activityid=t.id) as addressstr from qkjvip_member_activity t where 1=1
and EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signup s left join [dbo].[qkjvip_member] b on (s.memberid=b.member_id) where s.acitvity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select top 1 * from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) )
union all SELECT t.*,2 istake, (SELECT top 1 address from qkjvip_member_signupaddress a where a.activityid=t.id) as addressstr from qkjvip_member_activity t where 1=1
and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_activitymbs s left join qkjvip_member b on (s.member_id=b.member_id) where s.activity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select top 1 * from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) ) and not EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkjvip_member_signup s left join [dbo].[qkjvip_member] b on (s.memberid=b.member_id) where s.acitvity_id=t.id and EXISTS( select top 1 * from qkjvip_member c where ISNULL(c.memberidto,c.member_id)=ISNULL(b.memberidto,b.member_id) and c.member_id='${params.memberIdSign}' ) )
) act order by act.end_date

union all SELECT * from ( SELECT top 1 T.* FROM QKJVIP_MEMBER_ACTIVITY T join sys_user u on (u.USER_ID=t.adduser) WHERE 1=1 and t.atype in (6) and t.ispri =0 ORDER BY t.end_date desc ,t.addtime desc ) b
